pages.text: Caribou were added shortly after the Christmas Patch due to a large influx of players who loved the reindeer models that visually replaced O-Horses for the 24th and 25th of December, and wanted to keep them in the game for more than just Christmas. They work very similarly to O-Horses and can be tamed, ridden, and use saddlebags and horse armor. They can be killed for Caribou Meat, bones and leather. They spawn in snowy and taiga biomes.
